metadata.name: Symbolic Elites
metadata.description:
By drawing the frame of events and ideas, the discourse elites who hold power in the media resulting social control. The academicians, writers, artists, directors, and journalists, defined by Bourdieu (symbolic elites), cooperate to continue the status quo in the service of power so that they do not lose their living standards and jeopardize their position.

Hamza Kirbas (1992) lives and works in Istanbul, Turkey. After having graduated from the Faculty of Fine Arts of Batman University in 2017 he proceeded in his art education with a Master's Degree in Painting at Hacettepe University Institute of Fine Arts. He was nominated for the 2018 Blooom Art Award. His works have been exhibited in numerous shows internationally for instance in Turkey, the UK, the US France, Hungary, Germany, Ecuador, Greece and Italy.
